channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Nintendo reveals its first Switch 2 Joy-Con color variant
item.description:
Nintendo has unveiled the first color variants for the Switch 2 Joy-Cons in light purple and light green, set to arrive on February 12 alongside Mario Tennis Fever. The new controllers are now on pre-order for $100 and include matching wrist-straps.
Other than the colorway, these are standard Joy-Con 2 controllers with motion controls and HD rumble, along with the C Button for GameChat and the mouse controls for compatible games. However, you may have noticed something weird about them — the colors are on the inner rails, so you'll barely be able to see them when the Joy-Con 2s are connecte...

item.title: Jessica Jones’ Return Could Lead to Her Own TV Show Again
item.description: Plus, two more long-in-limbo Marvel TV shows could get back on track after 'Secret Wars'.

item.title: Hands on with a prototype of Clicks’ Communicator, a new BlackBerry-like smartphone
item.description: TechCrunch goes hands-on at the CES 2025 show with the new Clicks Communicator, a new Android smartphone with a physical keyboard.

item.title: NASA Postpones ISS Spacewalk Over Medical Issue, Considers Early Crew Return
item.description: Two NASA astronauts were planning to conduct a spacewalk outside the International Space Station on Thursday, but now, it appears they may be coming home early.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : la 4K est à petit prix dans cette sélection des meilleures offres sur les TV et les vidéoprojecteurs
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver font moins de bruit que le Black Friday, mais cela reste une occasion de dénicher de belles affaires. Sur les TV 4K et les vidéoprojecteurs par exemple, pour remplacer son écran poussiéreux par une dalle OLED flambant neuve ou un vidéoprojecteur dernier cri.

item.title: Google's Pixel Buds Pro 2 earbuds are on sale for $165
item.description: It's hard to find better wireless earbuds than Google's Pixel Buds Pro 2 if you're an Android user. The statement is even more true if you have a Pixel phone. If you're on the market for a new pair, you can grab the Pixel Buds Pro 2 for $165 in the hazel colorway, which is $54 off their usual price. Other color options are also discounted, just not as steeply. The device made our list of the best wireless earbuds, and this is particularly true for those tied into the Pixel ecosystem. These earbuds are on the smaller side and, more importantly, comfortable to wear for long periods of time. The...

item.title: Dell reveals people don't care about AI in PCs – and a new truly embarrassing Windows 11 fail shows why
item.description: Dell says people are 'not buying PCs based on AI' – just as a cringeworthy AI agent fail pops up with terrible timing for Microsoft.

item.title: Could AI be a scapegoat in layoffs?
item.description: A surge in graduates and other conventional cases are putting more strain on jobs than artificial intelligence.

item.title: Xbox’s Developer Direct returns on January 22nd with Fable and Forza Horizon 6 gameplay
item.description: Microsoft's annual Xbox Developer Direct event is taking place on January 22nd this year. The fourth Developer Direct will provide a closer look at two of Microsoft's biggest Xbox games this year, Forza Horizon 6 and Fable, as well as a first in-depth look at Beast of Reincarnation from Game Freak. Playground Games will debut […]

item.title: Crypto : une fonctionnaire du fisc a aidé le crime organisé à identifier des investisseurs
item.description: Une fonctionnaire est accusée d’avoir utilisé le fichier fiscal pour débusquer les Français qui détiennent des cryptomonnaies. L'employée des impôts aurait communiqué des informations sensibles à des criminels membres du crime organisé.

item.title: 19 CES gadgets you can buy right now
item.description:
CES 2026 is in full swing, but you don’t have to wait months to get your hands on everything announced in Las Vegas this year. A surprising number of products are already up for pre-order, if not outright available to buy today, from new chargers and docks to projectors, keyboards and smart home gear. CES is still a showcase for concepts and big promises, but these are the gadgets that have real pricing and an order button ready right now. Check out all of the CES 2026 gadgets you can buy right now below.
This article originally appeared on Engadget at htt...

item.title: Nvidia DLSS : avantages, fonctionnement, performances… Quand l’IA vient au secours de vos jeux
item.description: Grâce à sa technologie d'upscaling par l'IA, Nvidia vous offre une augmentation notable des performances de vos jeux. Découvrez dans notre dossier tout ce que vous devez savoir sur le DLSS : son fonctionnement, ses avantages, ses réglages et les différences avec les solutions concurrentes de chez AMD et Intel.

item.title: Fini les oublis : cette nouvelle bague connectée peut vibrer pour vos appels et même remplacer vos clés de voiture
item.description: Connue pour ses aspirateurs robots, la marque chinoise Dreame a lancé une vaste extension de son catalogue au CES en dévoilant notamment sa première bague connectée, la Dreame AI Smart Ring.

item.title: Apple AirPods Pro 3 are back on sale at a record low price
item.description:
The AirPods Pro 3 are on sale and back at their record low price of $200. This is marked down from $250, a hefty 20 percent discount. This model was just released in September of last year, so consider this a substantial discount for such a recent product.
We gave these AirPods a score of 90 out of 100 in our review and we consider them the best wireless earbuds for iPhone users. The third generation model is a substantial update to an already impressive product, bringing new features like live translation to the table. The AirPods Pro 3 also offer heart-rate tracking, allowing them to stre...

item.title: NordPass adds built-in TOTP authenticator for personal accounts
item.description: NordPass has added a TOTP authenticator directly into the app making secure login quick and seamless.

item.title: The best TVs of CES 2026
item.description: CES serves a few different purposes - to give us the sense of what's to come during the year, to introduce strange devices, and for companies to show off the newest technology. While there wasn't as much of the first as I had hoped, there sure was a lot of the latter. TV manufacturers delivered […]

item.title: I've got wide feet and struggle to find good running shoes — but these Altra shoes with unique lacing system are a supremely comfortable all rounder
item.description: Altra's Timp 5 Boa trail running shoe feature a unique lacing system for easy micro adjustments, and a supremely comfortable fit with wide toe box

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : les iPhone d’Apple, Samsung Galaxy et Google Pixel sont à prix cassé dans cette liste des meilleurs bons plans
item.description: Du 7 janvier au 3 février, les soldes d'hiver promettent de faire de bonnes affaires dans la tech, particulièrement auprès des e-commerçants français. C'est par exemple l'occasion de mettre la main sur un smartphone que le Père Noël aurait oublié de déposer au pied du sapin.

item.title: Renee Nicole Good merch quickly spreads on Amazon and Etsy just hours after Minneapolis shooting
item.description: In a familiar pattern, e-commerce sellers have moved to instantly capitalize on a viral news event, but their ideological motives aren’t always clear. Less than 24 hours after the horrifying shooting of woman by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agent in Minneapolis, Minnesota, merchandise related to the slain U.S. citizen is already proliferating on e-commerce shopping sites, including on Amazon and Etsy. Here’s what you need to know....

item.title: Comparatif autonomie : quel casque Bluetooth choisir en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous recherchez avant tout une excellente autonomie pour votre futur casque audio sans fil ? La rédaction de Frandroid a sélectionné pour vous les modèles les plus endurants, avec ou sans réduction active de bruit.

item.title: On a rarement vu un MacBook Air M2 à un prix si bas… merci les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Sorti en 2022, le MacBook Air M2 reste une valeur sûre pour celles et ceux qui cherchent un ordinateur portable à la fois léger, performant et endurant. Bonne nouvelle : ce modèle iconique voit son prix chuter à seulement 699 euros pour les soldes 2026, grâce à un code promo chez Cdiscount.

item.title: The best tech announced at CES 2026 so far
item.description: The CES show floor officially closes its doors at the end of tomorrow, but that hasn't slowed the flood of announcements and reveals coming out of Las Vegas. If you're struggling to stay on top of all the new tech, gadgets, concepts, and AI-powered devices as day three of CES gets underway, we've rounded up […]

item.title: CES 2026 Day 2: All of the coolest tech we saw on the show floor during the second day
item.description: CES 2026’s second day was all about hands on time with new tech. From Lego’s most ambitious play experiment yet to assistive mobility tech, smart home ideas that actually feel affordable and robots that might one day fold your laundry, here’s what stood out most on January 7.Lego Smart PlayLego Star Wars Smart Play: Luke's Red Five X-WingNathan Ingraham for EngadgetLEGO’s new Smart Play system feels far more compelling in person than it did on stage. The Smart Brick, combined with Smart Tags and Smart Minifigures, responds dynamically to movement, proximity and context, triggering sounds and i...

item.title: ElevationLabs' 10-year extended battery case for AirTags is 30 percent off
item.description: AirTags already have a decently long battery life, but you will end up needing to replace the coin cell every two years or so. If you don't even want to be bothered with that, ElevationLab made just the accessory for you: its AirTag battery case that can power the tracker for up to 10 years is on sale for 30 percent off. You can pick one up for only $16, and it's available in two- and four-packs as well at a discount. The TimeCapsule case uses two AA batteries to offer up to 14 times the lifespan of the CR2032 battery that powers an AirTag. The company based those estimates on Energizer Ultima...

item.title: The weirdest tech we've seen at CES 2026 so far
item.description: CES is famous for ushering in big TVs, faster chips and serious upgrades to the tech we already use every day. It’s also where companies feel emboldened to ask some very strange questions, like whether your toilet should analyze your poop or your nails should change color on command. From experimental laptops to health tech that probably didn’t need a camera, these are the weirdest gadgets we spotted at CES 2026.Throne toilet computerThe Throne device perched on the side of a toilet.Daniel Cooper for EngadgetThrone is a toilet-mounted computer that uses cameras and microphones to analyze your ...

item.title: Everything announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown off a wide ar...

item.title: Shokz invente la réduction de bruit pour oreilles libres avec l’OpenFit Pro
item.description: C'est l'une des sensations audio du CES 2026. Shokz, spécialiste de l'écoute à oreilles libres, lance l'OpenFit Pro. Leur promesse est de vous couper du vacarme du monde sans rien boucher de vos oreilles.

item.title: Les robots humanoïdes savent danser, mais l’industrie s’impatiente de les voir travailler
item.description: Des robots humanoïdes ont dansé, fait des sauts périlleux, distribué les cartes au blackjack et joué au ping-pong cette semaine au salon de la tech de Las Vegas, mais certains acteurs de l’industrie s’impatientent : ils veulent les voir devenir utiles, et ne plus être seulement une promesse d’avenir.

item.title: Use Classic Outlook? This Microsoft bug might stop you from opening encrypted emails
item.description: There is no fix available, but you can always revert to an older version.

item.title: More GameStop stores across the US are reportedly expected to shut down this month as part of cost-cutting efforts
item.description: GameStop is reportedly planning to shutter multiple stores across the United States in January as part of the company's ongoing cost-cutting efforts.

item.title: La course à la batterie solide est définitivement lancée dans le vélo électrique, avec des grosses révolutions en vue
item.description: Le spécialiste taïwanais ProLogium annonce une alliance avec trois autres sociétés pour la conception de batteries solides, dont certaines à destination des vélos cargos électriques, au mieux à partir de 2028.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : les premières offres sont en ligne, voici les meilleurs deals à saisir
item.description: Après les fêtes, la nouvelle année s'est installée en introduisant avec elle les soldes d'hiver ! Cette édition promet de belles affaires à ne pas manquer pour s’équiper à petit prix avant la hausse annoncée en 2026. Comptez sur Frandroid pour vous relayer uniquement les meilleures offres.

item.title: CES 2026 live updates: See the latest news, surprises, and strange tech from LG, Samsung, Lego, and new startups
item.description: CES 2026 is finally here, and Mashable reporters are on the ground looking for the best in show. Get live updates from the showroom floor and behind the scenes.

item.title: A neuroscientist’s 5-step plan to upgrade your brain
item.description: Neuroscience shows metacognition makes you more likely to be successful. Here’s how to strengthen this often overlooked skill. Thomas Edison said that success is “1 percent inspiration and 99 percent perspiration.” But what if his famous formula is missing a key ingredient? What if success demands not just creativity and perseverance, but a third, much less discussed skill? ...

item.title: Setting your 2026 reading goals? These book apps help me keep track.
item.description: A bunch of apps I regularly use that track your TBR (to be read) pile, books you DNF (did not finish), and offer suggestions.

item.title: New Call of Duty x Fallout collab means free Warzone skins and loads of new content
item.description: The new Call of Duty x Fallout collab brings loads of free content to Black Ops 7 and Warzone.

item.title: The Daily Show reacts to Trump threatening to take over Greenland
item.description: "The Daily Show" host Ronnie Chieng has responded to the recent news of Donald Trump wanting to take over Greenland.

item.title: Volvo teases EX60 electric SUV with massive range and fast charging
item.description: Volvo has revealed some of the key figures for its upcoming EX60 mid-size electric SUV.

item.title: Samsung just won CES 2026 with its creaseless folding OLED – but I hope the iPhone Fold gets it first
item.description: Samsung’s creaseless folding display is an engineering wonder – and if the company has any sense, it’ll give it to Apple first.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs écouteurs sans fil en 2026 ?
item.description: Les écouteurs sans fil Bluetooth se sont imposés comme des accessoires essentiels au quotidien, tant pour la musique que pour les appels ou le sport. Nous avons sélectionné et testé pour vous les meilleurs modèles d'écouteurs sans fil les plus adaptés à vos besoins et à votre budget.

item.title: On Friday the 13th This Year, Even Your Podcasts Can Kill You
item.description: That's the plot of 'undertone,' a new film from A24, which opens on Friday, March 13.

item.title: Gmail : Google offre gratuitement ces trois nouveautés normalement payantes
item.description: La messagerie de Google va profiter d’un sacré coup de boost grâce à Gemini. Google rend gratuits plusieurs outils d’IA comme les réponses suggérées et les aperçus IA pour tous les utilisateurs et inaugure de nouvelles fonctions avancées pour les utilisateurs Premium.

item.title: Volvo's EX60 electric crossover promises 400 miles of EPA range
item.description: Ahead of a launch later this month, Volvo has teased some impressive details about its upcoming electric crossover. The EX60, which slots between the EX40 and EX90, will offer an EPA range of 400 miles, beating all other Volvos and most EVs in general. It will also be the first Volvo car to use a megacasting process designed to reduce weight and boost manufacturing efficiency. "With our new electric vehicle architecture, we directly address the main worries that customers have when considering a switch to a fully electric car," said Volvo CTO Anders Bell. "The result is class-leading range an...

item.title: Google Is Adding an ‘AI Inbox’ to Gmail That Summarizes Emails
item.description: New Gmail features, powered by the Gemini model, are part of Google’s continued push for users to incorporate AI into their daily life and conversations.

item.title: Google is taking over your Gmail inbox with AI
item.description: Google is announcing a new AI Inbox view for Gmail that, instead of presenting your emails in a traditional list, uses AI to offer personalized to-dos and summaries of topics you might want to follow from your emails. It's a potentially huge shift in how you might navigate your Gmail, especially if you have a […]

item.title: Gmail debuts a personalized AI Inbox, AI Overviews in search, and more
item.description: Gmail is also bringing several AI features that were previously available only to paid users to all users.

item.title: Former Bolt CEO Maju Kuruvilla’s startup triples to $100M valuation
item.description: Spangle has raised $15 million in a Series A round to expand its AI-generated shopping experiences.

item.title: Gmail is getting a whole host of AI updates to try and solve your most irritating workplace tasks
item.description: From smarter replies to even more AI overviews, more AI is coming to Gmail.

item.title: Gmail is getting a Gemini AI overhaul
item.description: In a move that should surprise nobody, Google is stuffing more Gemini AI into Gmail. A host of new features, some of which are already familiar to Workspace users, are rolling out today for Gmail users in the US. Some are free, while others require a Google AI Pro or Ultra subscription.The first premium feature is AI Overviews, the same name as a similar feature in Google Search. Gmail’s version lets you ask questions about your messages in the search bar, using natural language. Google uses the example of, "Who was the plumber that gave me a quote for the bathroom renovation last year?" It’s ...

item.title: The gaming monitors that caught our eye at CES 2026
item.description: CES is about many things, but primarily it's about screens. TVs and laptops get the most attention, but you'll find all kinds of new PC monitors, too. At CES 2026, several companies are using the trade show as an opportunity to update their gaming monitor lineups. This year expanding what OLED panels can do in terms of refresh rates, brightness and color production is the big focus, but there's some more unusual options, too, like a glasses-free 3D monitor. The collection below are some of our favorite gaming monitors that have already been announced: LG UltraGear GX7LG's latest QHD OLED gamin...

item.title: Le télescope James-Webb surprend les astronomes : des étoiles primitives formaient déjà de la poussière !
item.description: La galaxie Sextans A offre aux astronomes une opportunité unique de mieux comprendre ce qui se jouait dans les premières galaxies de notre Univers. En l’observant à l’aide du télescope spatial James-Webb, ils viennent d’y faire une découverte à laquelle ils ne s’attendaient vraiment...

item.title: L’IA clone la voix des commentateurs pour PSG-OM : une première mondiale ce soir
item.description: Grande première ce soir pour le Trophée des Champions à Koweït City. La LFP teste une IA capable de traduire les commentaires en italien tout en clonant la voix des journalistes français.

item.title: Boulanger solde à -30 % ce TV Mini LED ultra lumineux (165 Hz) noté 9/10 par nos soins
item.description: Le téléviseur Hisense 55U8Q est un modèle haut de gamme réputé pour sa luminosité record avec ses Mini-LED, à retrouver pour 699 euros au lieu de 999 euros sur Boulanger.

item.title: The Magic: The Gathering Spider-Man Play Booster Box is at its lowest-ever price on Amazon
item.description: The Magic: The Gathering Marvel’s Spider-Man Play Booster Box is down to $104.99 at Amazon, its lowest price to date and closer to market value.

item.title: DJI Avata 360 leak shows versatile drone could beat Insta360 with one unique feature
item.description: We have more pictures of the DJI Avata 360, and it looks as though it's ready to take on the Antigravity A1.

item.title: I love the new Philips Hue Essential smart bulbs, but how do the new Lifx Everyday lights compare?
item.description: Lifx has followed in Hue's footsteps with a new line of cheap and very cheerful bulbs, but which ones should be brightening your home?

item.title: Sony unveiled a new 'HyperPop' accessory collection — but it's absolutely hideous
item.description: Sony has just revealed some seriously ugly new DualSense Wireless Controllers and PS5 console covers.

item.title: 'Deliciously bonkers' or 'Too grim to be fun'? New Netflix show His & Hers divides critics — but they all love its wild ending
item.description: His & Hers is a new Netflix murder-mystery show that's already drawing attention for its shocking ending.

item.title: Google Messages : cette nouveauté va enfin soulager vos pouces
item.description: Les adeptes de grands écrans vont bientôt pouvoir reposer leurs mains. Google Messages simplifie son interface pour s’utiliser à une main.
